```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)

```

```{r}
mack_verts <- read.csv(here::here("data", "AS00601.csv"))
                       
mack_verts <- mack_verts |> clean_names()
mack_verts
```

```{r}
view(mack_verts$species)
view(mack_verts$length1)
view(mack_verts$weight)

mc_wt_5 <- mack_verts$weight[5]
mc_wt_5

mc_length_8_20 <- mack_verts$length1[8:20]
mc_length_8_20

mc_dates <- mack_verts$sampledate

mc_salamanders <-mack_verts %>% dplyr::filter(mack_verts$species == "DITE")

mc_salamanders
view(mc_salamanders)
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = mc_salamanders, aes(
  x = length1, 
  y = weight ))+
  geom_point(size =.3, alpha = 5, aes(color = weight),
             show.legend = TRUE) +
             scale_color_gradient(low = "yellow",
                                  high = "red") +
  theme_classic()
```
